constituent: ceremony, person, righteousness, sheep, ego, hand, fiesta
koohiiStory1: Mr. T is the master of ceremonies because he is a righteous dude.
koohiiStory2: Mr. T was briefly a rapper, that is an M.C., that is a master of CEREMONIES (the origin of the phrase). But he sang only RIGHTEOUS songs, no cursing or anything like that. (all true: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_rBidCkJxo ).
